title: The content definition document context
description:
The content definition document context.
Supported root contexts: ArmyTemplate, Artifact, CharacterAnimation, CharacterRoom, ColonyEventDefinition, ComponentDefinition, CreatureType, DesignTemplate, EmpirePolicy, FleetTemplate, GameEvent, Government, LocationEffectGroupDefinition, OrbType, PlanetaryFacilityDefinition, Race, ResearchProjectDefinition, Resource, ShipHull, TroopDefinition
See https://github.com/DW2MC/DW2ModLoader/wiki/Content-definition-document

ArmyTemplate.title: DistantWorlds.Types.ArmyTemplate context
ArmyTemplate.description:
The DistantWorlds.Types.ArmyTemplate content definition root context.
Available instructions: state, add, template, remove, remove-all, update, update-all
See https://github.com/DW2MC/DW2ModLoader/wiki/DistantWorlds.Types.ArmyTemplate#Content-definition-root-context

state.title: Create or modify variables in a globally shared state.

allOf.title: Add one ArmyTemplate definition.
Clone one ArmyTemplate definition and change it's identity.
Update one ArmyTemplate definition.
Update a matching selection of ArmyTemplate definitions.

remove-all.title: Remove a matching selection of ArmyTemplate definitions.
